subject: Re: [junit] Errors Junit in Jbuilder
msgSnippet: It looks that java executable is not found on your path.  I am not sure which open tool you are using, but you need to check if there are anyway for you to
messageBody:
It looks that java executable is not found on your path. I am not sure
which open tool you are using, but you need to check if there are anyway
for you to specify the path for java.exe in that open tool.

If not, you need to set your path environment variable to include the
path to java executable. In windows, it is something like
"C:\j2sdk1.4.1_01\bin"

I would expect that this opentool is downloaded in a zip file and
majority of the time there is a README file telling you what you need to
do to make it work.

Thanks
Shane

nitinforjava wrote:

>IOException following by Runtime errors as below :
>java.io.IOException: CreateProcess: java -classpath %.....
>at java.lang.Win32Process.create(Native Method)
>at java.lang.Win32Process.<init>(Win32Process.java:66)
>at java.lang.Runtime.execInternal(Native Method)
>at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:551)
>at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:418)
>at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:361)
>at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:325)
>at ivan.tools.jbuilder.opentool.junit.a.g.a(Unknown Source)
>at ivan.tools.jbuilder.opentool.junit.c.a(Unknown Source)
>at ivan.tools.jbuilder.opentool.junit.c.access$11(Unknown Source)
>at ivan.tools.jbuilder.opentool.junit.c$2.run(Unknown Source)
>
>Can anyone help me out for this..
>
>Thanks in Advance
>
>Nitin
